Yieldify | Software Engineer | London, UK

http://www.yieldify.com/

Yieldify is a predictive service for converting website visitors into customers. Our solution has been helping hundreds of websites improve their conversion rates by enhancing the shopping experience of millions of people. Being only 2 years old, we are considered to be London's fastest growing SaaS company. We were recently backed by Google and Softbank, and have opened offices in Australia, USA and Germany. We are now looking for bright engineers to expand our team in London and help us keep innovating!

Check out our careers page and find out more about interesting challenges you'd be working on (web scale data and traffic, distributed systems, machine learning,...)

http://yieldify.com/gb/about/#careers
